titles.title: A resolution Expressing the sense of the Senate that the leadership of the Palestinian people by Yasser Arafat is a hindrance to peace in the Middle East, and that such peace depends on institutions free from the taint of terrorism.

A resolution Expressing the sense of the Senate that the leadership of the Palestinian people by Yasser Arafat is a hindrance to peace in the Middle East, and that such peace depends on institutions free from the taint of terrorism.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

bill.summary: Expresses the sense of the Senate that the leadership of the Palestinian people by Yasser Arafat is a hindrance to the Middle East peace process and that such peace depends on the construction of independent, transparent, and accountable institutions free from the taint of terrorism.
